name: BoundShere
description:
Hi, i'm Gandalf_The_Wise and I present you my new future project called BoundShere

That game will be talking about two worlds:

Our world - very primitive, and quite.

Alterworld - world with many unexplained phenomena, creatures and locations.

Obviously, the story of the story will not only be on behalf of Leo, but also one or more additional characters.

In my notebook there are still many different characters and some future cards for this game. And I need a lot of time to implement the first alpha version. So wait for the news.
